name: Yue Huang 0001
content: Yue Huang | XMU Yue Huang  黄悦 SmartDSP Lab School of Informatcis, Xiamen University (厦门大学) yhuang2010@xmu.edu.cn I am now working at School of Informatics, Xiamen University (厦门大学). My research interest includes Machine Learning and Related applications. Updates: Educations: Ph.D., Biomedical Engineering, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China, Jan 2010 B.S.E., Electrical Engineering, Xiamen University, Xiamen, Fujian, China, Jul 2005 Visiting student, Bioinformatics core, The Methodist Hospital, TX, U.S.A., Nov 2007 - Dec 2008 Visiting scholar, ECE and BME, Carnegie Mellon University, PA, U.S.A., Sep 2015 - Sep 2016 Awards: 第九届吴文俊人工智能科学技术奖（自然科学奖）link 2020年福建省自然科学三等奖 Our lab won the first prize in GAMMA! Our lab won the first prize in MICCAI18-challenge MRBrains18! Our lab won the third prize in MICCAI18-challenge CPM18! Fundings: 低资源下目标鲁棒探测关键技术研究，全国重点实验室开放课题，2023.12-2025.10 面向多模态数据的目标检测与识别，江淮前沿技术协同创新中心追梦基金，2023.12-2025.11 National Natural Science Foundation of China (国家自然科学基金面上项目): Histopathological image feature extraction via unsupervised domain adaptation 教育部专项，长尾分布下的目标识别研究，2021.12-2023.12 National Natural Science Foundation of China, Key Program(国家自然科学基金重点项目/联合基金，NSFC U19B2031) Co-PI(合作方负责人), Robust target recognition via few-shot learning, 2020.1 - 2023.12 Tencent open fund(腾讯犀牛鸟项目滚动资助), graphical data analysis and applications. 2020.1 - 2020.12 Fundemantal research fund for the Central Univerisity Grants(中央高校基本科研业务费), Data analysis in surveillance images. 2018 - 2020 China Computer Foundation-Tencent Open Fund (中国计算机学会-腾讯犀牛鸟项目，入选率11%), Image-based drug screening via deep learning, 2018 - 2019 National Natural Science Foundation of China (国家自然科学基金面上项目，NSFC 81671766): Microscopy image feature extraction in high-throughput screening via pretraining convolutional neural networks and sparse representation, 2017-2020 National Natural Science Foundation of Fujian Province (福建省自然科学基金面上项目，2017J01126): Image feature extraction for high content screening system, 2017 -
